tabs, address bar, bookmarks bar, navigation buttons, profile icon, and extensions icons

content.title: ChatGPT
content.visibleText:
Hallo Lars,

Ich hoffe, es geht dir gut und alles läuft gut.

Ich wollte wegen ChatGPT nachfragen. Wir haben keine Natur von Daimler gesehen und wollten nachfragen, ob der Hagen zu unserer Kosten-Lose-Funktion hast.

Falls du Fragen hast, rät mir ein Mitarbeiter.

Wenn du mehr über ChatGPT erfahren möchtest, hier ist eine Bildungsreihe, die dir weiterhelfen kann.

Lass mich wissen, falls du Fragen hast.

Mit freundlichen Grüßen,
Firat

If you need any adjustments, please let me know.

I have only B1 level of German, put appropriate words accordingly.

And use formal speech.

Sure, here is a more appropriate version for your level and formal speech:

Hallo Lars,

Ich hoffe, es geht ihnen gut und alles läuft gut.

Message ChatGPT

content.title: Email Content
content.layoutDescription: Email view with header and body
content.visibleText:
CWT / IgniteTech -- Bi-Weekly Check-In Meetings
Thursday, Jun 13, 2024 - 10:30am - 11am (Eastern Time - New York)

Guests
Jesse Manning - organizer
jrmanning@ignitetech.com
firat.gomi@devfactory.com

Firat Gomi

Additional details
There's a possibility that I will not be able to call in; however, Firat Gomi from the June team will be attending. Based on my meeting with Rich and team in Minneapolis, we'd like to make Joe Cowell available to you for this event on your private line. We'll discuss how to make this happen! If it's at all possible, don't worry, you're in good hands with him.

Additionally, please note that the meeting location has changed -- we shifted away from Zoom and now use Google Meet as our videoconferencing tool.

content.title: Gmail
content.visibleText:
Gmail
Mail
Compose
P Jesse
3 members
and start taking the next steps with them to deploy it? They have a proactive drive and want to test our integration in a specific instance.
Jesse Manning
Also, having a meeting with our Cleveland Clinic. I've got nothing today then, and they don't have anything too. But if you wanted to join to get a quick update on their deployment experience, I'm happy to add you to that meeting as well.
I'm more than happy to help them start for OCC; I already had a meeting with them on Tuesday, and we've talked regarding how they work with CIOPlus, so I don't think they would need to see me again.
but thank you for the invitation nonetheless, can I still join in if you need me to?
Yes, please join CVT. I won't be joining most likely but will if I can, but that's a great to meet with
It's sad that it got cancelled
I was looking forward to it
Jesse Manning
Me too! They are going through some internal staff changes though :(
I feel
email reply
I imagine so
It feels weird when they say 'putting people on hold, because we can focus on it now' there is literally nothing for them to focus on, do they feel like they have to hybridize people?
